fields.description:
h2. Request

Note, Marshall asked me to raise this.

Currently, media permissions must be explicitly configured in tiapp.xml in order to access the calendar.

Just as is done for other APIs, add permissions automatically during the build process.
fields.summary: Android: Media - automatically add necessary permissions to tiapp.xml

comments.body: Once resolved the documentation changes requested by TIMOB-19851 can be reverted.

Looks like - and my test shows - that we *do* automatically add camera permissions:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/1607237763f9e490e41d98b8d711ac49eeb01043/android/cli/commands/_build.js#L3419

But only when {{Ti.Media.showCamera()}} is used. We should also add the permissions if {{Ti.Media.requestCameraPermissions()}} is used.
This is invalid, but might be edge case covered by TIMOB-19933
